name: Business Edge
description:
We are a Microsoft web development company specializing in creating custom web-based solutions for companies of all types and sizes. We do not outsource any work to foreign countries, everything is done in house by our own staff of senior application developers and project managers. All work is guaranteed and there are no licensing or intellectual property restrictions. We focus primarily on Microsoft technologies such as Microsoft Asp.net and Microsoft SQL Server.
However we are also highly skilled in JQuery, AJAX, Javascript, CSS, HTML, Responsive Design, and mobile application development for Android, iPhone, Blackberry, and Windows Phone. We will support your application whether it is hosted in your facility or we can host it as well on either shared hosting or cloud servers.
